# Telegram Channel to RSS Feed Generator (LLM-Generated)

**⚠️ Disclaimer:** This project's core logic was generated by a Large Language Model (LLM).

## Overview

This is a lightweight and serverless project designed to convert public Telegram channel messages into a standard RSS feed. It is specifically optimized for deployment on **Cloudflare Workers**.

This allows you to track updates from your favorite Telegram channels using any standard RSS reader.

## Features

* Converts Telegram channel messages into a valid RSS 2.0 feed.
* Serverless architecture using Cloudflare Workers for low cost and high availability.
* Easy deployment and configuration.

## Recommended Companion App

This RSS feed generator works great with **[Read You](https://github.com/ReadYouApp/ReadYou)**, an open-source Android RSS reader.

## Usage

Once deployed, the generated RSS feed URL will be your Cloudflare Worker endpoint (e.g., `https://your-worker-name.your-username.workers.dev/{channel_username}`). Simply add this URL to your RSS reader.
